channel.title: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please
channel.description:
hello guys i really need help can someone tell me how to change this text?
heres a pic [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/o9hm38.jpg[/img]
How can i change the farming XP to anything?or is that not possible? can someone please tell me i will rep++

item.title: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

i asked him for help but no reply… + i tried i extracted the data.dat file to my desktop and i opened it on lin’s program but still nothing all i get is the magic book thats it

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please

item.title: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Mr. Bobby link=topic=465781.msg3406094#msg3406094 date=1290325795]
if its delta u can edit it via texthandler or sumthin like tht.
[/quote]Wrong. It’s inside the data.dat file, which is packed inside the cache.

You need to use a cache editor, such as Tom’s Cache Suite, to extract the data file.

Then you need to use Lin’s Interface Editor to edit it.[/quote]

Unless it’s hardcoded

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please

item.title: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

i have both of em but i dont know what to do -.- please can you explain

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please

item.title: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Tom’ s Cache Suite- extracting, editing, and repacking the cache
Lin’ s Interface Editor- self explanatory, edits and creates interfaces

You gotta start with the cache suite then use the interface editor.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please

item.title: Can someone tell tell me how to change this? Please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

im 100% positive u can do it in the texthandler in delta bases.

c.sendQuest("WHATEVER U WANT HERE", 13919); c.sendQuest("NEXT LVL AT:", 13920);

will change it.

Read full topic
